column4: Under gparted its says my /dev/sdb1 with filesystem ext3, wouldnt it say NTFS if that was indeed what it was under?

Well i made the mistake of loading ubuntu earlier on my external and it installed grub on my first hard drive with windows and then i used supergrub to fix my MBR and then reformatted the external and loaded ubuntu fresh
putting it grub on the second
well if you have any files you overwrote you might be able to still recover them just use GetDataBack
